verbose_text: In sediment samples of the IMV Omoregie et al. found several genera of sulfate reducing bacteria (Desulfosarcina, Desulfococcus, Desulfocapsa, Desulfobulbus) as well as Methanococcoides, a methanogenic Archea, and the anaerobic methane oxidizers ANME-1, ANME-2, and ANME-3.
evidence: sulfate-reducing bacteria (Desulfosarcina, Desulfococcus, Desulfocapsa, Desulfobulbus) as well as Methanococcoides, a methanogenic Archea, and the anaerobic methane oxidizers ANME-1
